llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Great! Based on your preferences and budget, here's a suggested 7-day itinerary for your trip to Florida:

Day 1 (March 23rd): Louisville to Fort Myers

* Fly from Louisville to Fort Myers (Flight Number: F3615988, price: $398, duration: 2 hours 15 minutes)
* Check-in at a hotel in Fort Myers (e.g., Aloft Fort Myers Downtown, rate: $149 per night)

Day 2 (March 24th): Fort Myers

* Visit the Edison and Ford Winter Estates (price: $30 per person, duration: 2-3 hours)
* Explore the historic downtown area of Fort Myers (free)

Day 3 (March 25th): Fort Myers to Orlando

* Drive from Fort Myers to Orlando (distance: 159 miles, duration: 3 hours)
* Visit Universal Studios Florida (price: $100 per person, duration: half-day)

Day 4 (March 26th): Orlando

* Visit the Walt Disney World Resort (price: $150 per person, duration: full day)
* Enjoy the evening at Disney Springs (free)

Day 5 (March 27th): Orlando to Tampa

* Drive from Orlando to Tampa (distance: 86 miles, duration: 2 hours)
* Visit the Florida Aquarium (price: $30 per person, duration: 2-3 hours)

Day 6 (March 28th): Tampa

* Explore the historic Hyde Park neighborhood of Tampa (free)
* Visit the Tampa Museum of Art (price: $15 per person, duration: 2-3 hours)

Day 7 (March 29th): Departure from Tampa

* Return to Louisville via flight or drive (distance: 727 miles, duration: 12 hours by car)

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights: $360 ($398 x 2 flights)
* Accommodation: $540 ($149 per night x 3 nights in Fort Myers, $150 per night x 2 nights in Orlando, $15 per night x 4 nights in Tampa)
* Transportation: $100 ($30 per person x 3 trips in Florida, $20 per person x 2 trips in Florida)
* Attractions and activities: $1,680 ($100 per person x 16 hours in Florida, $30 per person x 4 attractions in Florida)
Total budget: $7,800

Note: Prices are approximate and may vary based on individual preferences and exchange rates.

This itinerary should give you a good balance of city exploration and theme park fun, while staying within your budget. Enjoy your trip to Florida!
